description: This file defines URL routing for the notes backend API, mapping URL patterns to corresponding view functions and class-based views.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles the health check endpoint to indicate server status.

methods.name: NoteListCreateView
methods.description: Class-based view handling listing and creation of notes.

methods.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyView
methods.description: Class-based view handling retrieve, update, and delete operations for individual notes.
